a:r.a:t: Benefits of Running a Lincoln “Debt Process” Alongside an M&A Process
Utilize Lincoln’s extensive relationships and financing experience to access the best lenders for HKA
Understand / develop tactical positioning for lender “hot buttons” and potential financing issues
Act as a strong advocate for the Company in the lending markets
Representative Unitranche and Second Lien Lenders
Lincoln believes HKA can obtain up to 5.0x total leverage through either a senior / second lien debt structure or unitranche
